tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
we (Sahana & Shiva) visiting Dr.Meenakshi R Kamath from Oct 2018 it is been 1 year and we had a baby girl normal delivery on Nov 1st 2019.Want to Share our experience might help other visitors
Strengths:
1.Prediction and Anticipation 100% of what next will happen at each phase,She  will share inputs if we dont follow we have to take challenges off course for our mistake also she will guide what need to be done with lot of patience.
2.Interactive communication based on situation you will observe her change in voice when your in sorrow counselling and gives confidence.When your in Labour Delivery room need to be tuff and strong she enforces things make our life happy for later phases.
3.Not only treats she educates about best practices to have normal delivery suggests to have prenatal yoga which was quite helpful in our case for normal delivery and handling pain but it depends upon when to start based on her suggestion and scan report.
4.Exact Delivery date prediction precisely before two weeks so no tuff time in  Bangalore traffic for us. Note:it depends on how to extract information.
Improvements:
1.Need to prepare strong back up and support team for her.Team cant match her skill and expectations it creates few unpleasant things but she care for patients point of view and fix once you bring to her notice.I believe her team should be ready to learn from experience rather all patients go and bring her notice.
2.work life balance to increase her productivity and service to her give her best potential out to all.As per my personal observation and Interactions Now she is having very tight schedule handling emergency,Daily consultation without any break from work this for me its quite stressful and would not really help unleash her highest potential and quality of service.

Overall we are very happy in this one year journey with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
My husband and I visited Dr.Meenakshi Kamat based on a referral from 2 of our neighbours (Who also took pregnancy care from her) for our 2nd child. In fact we had visited Cloud nine for our first delivery as well, but since we were completely dissatisfied with the earlier doctor (Not naming the doctor due to goodwill), we wanted to have a better experience and thus Dr.Meenakshi Kamat happened.

From day 1 of visiting her, she took utmost care of me. I in fact had a low placenta issue which is usually high-risk pregnancy care but without scaring me or my husband, she took us through the precautions to be taken care since the first tri-mester until I actually delivered.

Dr.Meenakshi is always patient, polite, humble and very social. She takes the extra step to know about the family and understand us better to suggest better food options and medicines that are compatible and palatable:) She always takes time to talk, socialize, examine and provides proper feedback and information.

Even if there are things that could be potentially complex topics, she takes the time to explain in an understandable manner and until we get it. My son who was 5 years when we started visiting her in fact became very friendly towards the end because of the rapport the doctor established.

She is always smiling and never in a hurry or showed frustration for any reason on me (patient) even though her day might be bad. She handles pressure so cool and calm and we really liked the whole experience with her.

When the final D-day came, (MIne was a C-section due to the low placenta issue and the first delivery was a C-section as well) she handled the whole delivery so well and even the post-pregnancy care was well managed.

We would recommend this doctor as a MUST-VISIT doctor for your PREGNANCY CARE. Thank you so much doctor and we have a lovely daughter because of you. We are really thankful and grateful for your services.
reply_text: Thanks Roopa for your honest appreciation! Helps me to do better everyday üôèüèº

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Meenakshi Kamath for my second pregnancy which turned out 'Blessing in Disguise' for me. I had lost baby last year due to PIH. Dr have fulfilled my dream of having the second baby. Thankyou so much Doctor. I and my husband are overwhelmed by the postive attitude, friendlines, patience of listening to all your problems and giving the solution for it.

As the saying 'Everything is predefined and predetermined' we are destined to meet Dr Meenakshi Kamath who is God send person for us.

Once we talk to doctor we will be energised with postive vibes which madam spreads.

One think which doctor told to me is ' I am here to worry, you don't need to take tension' I obeyed her and today, I am blessed with healthy baby boy. She takes good care of her patients and answers your query through what's app and through calls as well. 

Thank you so much Doctor for all your support. You are like mother figure who helps all her kids with what is required with utmost care and love.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Vaginal Infection Treatment,Pregnancy Tests,Cervical Cerclage,
review:
Being a parent is one of the most amazing feelings one could wish for and so when I and my wife, Priyanka decided to take the next big step in our lives, we were very particular about the choice of the doctor.

Find a good doctor may be easy but finding a good doctor who also happens to be an amazing person is very rare!

Just like anyone else, we did our through research, read a lot of reviews before finalising a gynie.

We are very lucky to have met Ms Meenakshi Kamath and the journey thus far (since the very beginning to now being a parent of a week old baby boy) has been very memorable.

She is known to have a great rapport with each of her patients (which can be clearly seen from the reviews of others) and so, if you are looking for a gynie who has immense patience to listen to all your doubts/queries (from silly to serious ones), very supportive, a good guide, then we would very highly recommend Ms Meenakshi Kamath.

If and when we decide to have our second child, she will definitely be our preferred choice.

We are very glad to have crossed paths with her and would like to take this opportunity to express our humble gratitude.

Thank You, Doc :-)

Best Regards,
From the Baby Boy, Priyanka, Anoop
reply_text: Congratulations anoop and Priyanka!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor has prescribed medicine to delay periods. video call was for 5 minutes and the doctor hung up. Was requesting what side effects to expect from the medicine, etc., in the call and on chat, no response was provided. Just sent prescription and logged out.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
In all hospitals, inserting the vaginal pessary, that too, for a 75+ year old senior citizen, is covered within the consultation fee since it is a simple medical procedure.

During consultation, it appears that Dr.Meenakshi Kamath was heavily pressurizing my mother to undergo hysterectomy, the surgical procedure.

My 81 year old father too was present there.

My mother, a chronic diabetic & with other ailments, a retired LIC of India Employee, having already seen the serious side-effects of hysterectomy in her colleague and others, firmly said NO to Dr.Meenakshi Kamath.

Later, the hospital executive went in and met Dr.Meenakshi Kamath and she wrote ‚Çπ2500 for the pessary insertion.

In all hospitals, the charge, even when separately charged and not made part of consultation, for pessary insertion, is ‚Çπ500 to ‚Çπ1000 max.

But here, consultation which was purely for pessary insertion, was already charged.

In addition, was this ‚Çπ2500/-

Totally, *** * ****** ******* ********** ******* *** ***** **** ** **** *******

This is totally disappointing, especially since we saw cloudnine on the internet and decided to visit cloudnine.

**PLEASE DISCONTINUE SERVICES OF Dr.MEENAKSHI KAMATH Immediately.***** ***** ** ** ************* *** **** ********* ******* ************* *** **** *** *** *** ********* ** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am very fortunate that I consulted Dr. Meenakshi Kamath in the month of June 2020 and within a year I was blessed with a very handsome baby boy whom I gave birth to on 22nd June 2021.  

Dr. Kamath is extremely passionate and dedicated about her work and is a thorough professional, who gives equal attention to both (to be) Parents and listens to their approach towards parenthood. 
Apart from being friendly and strict at the same time, she is always available to her patients on phone calls or on whatsapp, and responds promptly to query time to time to her patients through messages.

 She is one such doctor who insists on normal delivery who are really hard to find in these days( I really have to tell this: During my last few minutes in labour, I was never confident of delivering the baby "normal" , I was feeling really tired and felt it's not possible as the entire labour and pain took for 3-4 hours long and the pain was excruciating( Felt Like beating up everyone then who ever was in front of me , Just Kidding),  Honestly the Labour pain is in next level and unexplainable, but thanks to Dr. Meenakshi Kamath who arrived on time and gave me the courage & confidence that I have to and can deliver "normal"  at that end moment her confidence had really helped in pushing and the baby was finally "out" in 15min.. I was actually surprised at myself that I could finally do it. 

My Husband and I can't thank her enough for motivating me throughout my pregnancy journey. 

Finally I would like to say the entire experience of my pregnancy and delivery went really smooth because of Dr. Meenakshi Kamath. 

I strongly recommend Dr. Meenakshi Kamath to everyone who is looking for doctors who are giving correct treatment as required for the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The entire childbirth process from 1st to 9th month was turned into an experience by her. The personal care, attention and explaination of health issues gave us a lot of comfort. She will take time to explain each step towards motherhood and what are the processes involved or challenges which might come up. Further she would explain how to cope or deal with those challenges. Moreover she is available on phone and whatsapp even at odd hours of night for any emergency. An overall extremely sayisfying experience. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi folks,

Myself kishore and Vasavi , we have met this doctor after the miscarriage of the first baby in Krishna seva srama by Dr. Pradeepa.

I had much more confidence in Dr. Meenakshi kamath because I know this doctor from my school days because she is a senior specialist in shekhar hospital since very long years.

We had pre and post pregnancy planning successful done by Dr. Meenakshi kamath 

We blessed with a healthy baby girl with healthy mother only because of the protocol and advice, treatment and support given by madam.

My heartfelt thanks to Meenakshi Madam for making a new endeavour in my life & we cannot forget you lifetime.

Please note for general public. In simple words you are 1000% in safe hands with Dr.Meenakshi kamath always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would like to thank doctor Meenakshi from the bottom of my heart for being such a strong tuff doctor and a friend. She has been with me throughout my pregnancy like a guardian angel one call msg away. She was true guide and tuff person when it comes to enforcing practices if I dint follow.. but a great friend whom I could confide in with all my health issues which she used to resolve immediately. I must say she is a brilliant doctor whom I would recommend to all for her service and skills. Thankyou doctor for being there for me and my family and help us have a happy healthy baby boy. We are eternally very grateful to you.
reply_text: Thanks Anita... your appreciation is my strength

tags: Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We visited Dr. Kamath for pregnancy and the birth of our child. This was our first child and needless to say we have had a lot of questions throughout the journey. 
But Dr. Kamath made the journey so smooth. *** ** ********* ************** ******** *** ******** She kept an open line of communication throughout the journey. I noticed that she also keeps her team on their toes, although the hospital's admin team needs to do better. She is very hands on in the care she provides and will put her best effort to try for a normally delivery. As overwhelming as this journey can get, it helps to have someone with her set of skills by your side. We had a wonderful holistic experience with her and would definitely recommend her. Thank you Doctor for delivering our baby.
reply_text: Thanks svidha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Hello, 
I have initially shared my experience with doctor Meenakshi for my pregnancy. That was smooth and went well.
Post pregnancy I got dengue and was dealing postpartum depression. Doctor listened to me very patiently and guided me well. The motherly figure attitude is which I like the most. 
She is very friendly and always create a positive attitude around.
There are so many doctors who can treat you and can give you medicine ,but few are there who gives there time and positive energy to is.
Many times I have messaged her in odd hours, and she has answered all .

Thanks Doctor,
Priya
reply_text: Thanks Priya! It is only the trust of my patients whom I love which keeps me doing only good work

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: pregnancy is one of the very important stage of life, like everyone I wanted to visit the best doctor for my pregnancy, and I was under the right hands, she guided me whats best n wats not, she was very very friendly and patiently answered all my queries. she always gave a chance to ask if there are any further questions, without any hurry. I had to undergo c-sec and I had fibroids problem, she removed those which was a extra help from her side. I strongly recommend Dr.Meenakshi mam to my friends and relatives. she is such a big help and she answers queries by phone which is a great help...thanks so much for everything mam..Thanks,Renuka & Nikhil

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Dr Meenakshi is a great doctor, very friendly and down to earth.I consulted her for my 2nd pregnancy.She's really supportive and took great care to have a smooth delivery.
 She's available for her patients anytime  and does not recommend unnecessary medication .
Every time I visited her she very patiently cleared all my doubts assuring that all will be fine.
I highly recommend Dr Meenakshi Kamath for everyone who wants to experience happy pregnancy and motherhood. 
I am really gratefull to her.Thank you Doctorüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: When I got to know I was pregnant I had lots of fear and unanswered questions. It was very stressful until I met Dr Meenakshi Kamath. The best decision I made was to go with her follow her instructions and came out successfully with good health and a healthy baby üòä Mine was a high risk pregnancy and was advised bed rest upto 5 months.. all I did was trust her and follow everything she said. I love how confident and precise she is about her decisions. She decides quickly and knows what‚Äôs best for the both of us.. With her around you your journey is beautiful and stress free.. I would strongly recommend her ** *** *** *** **** **** ******** ** ** üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Since the time I had conceived, Dr Meenakshi had been my consultant gyneocologist through my entire pregnancy and delivery. She has been an amazing help support in terms of clearing my doubts and assuring that all will be well. As about to be moms go through so many situations during pregnancy and the mixed emotions when the time approaches for the process of delivery, the consultant‚Äôs support and assurance plays a major role. My c-section delivery was done so smoothly, *** *** ********* ***** **** ******* **** *********** ** Dr Meenakshi and her team in the operating room and of course utmost care was taken by the post delivery team as well. It‚Äôs been over 2 weeks since I delivered and my son and I are doing well; my incision is healing well. Thanks Dr Meenakshi ( for the umpteenth time :)) Note to all:  I am sharing this experience to appreciate the doctor as well as my experience through my journey may help people looking at this forum have an insight while choosing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Really happy as I chose her this time. she is extremely friendly, very patient and answers all your questions no matter how silly or serious they are.she is very approachable unlike other doctors, answers our important questions on WhatsApp too which was really really helpful for me. I was so much at ease with her and she felt more like a family member. I am really grateful for delivering us a cute little bundle of joy üòÅ

review: I had a great experience with Dr. Meenakshi doctor. I was worried about my pregnancy because I was in "risky pregnancy". She treated with care and filled with positive energy and I am happy with her treatment. She is go to person anytime. Even if we delay appointment time, she waited for us in her busy schedule, thank you so much doctor, I would recommend 100% for others too.
reply_text: Thanks Shilpakala!You were one of the most obedient patients I ever had...you were so good at managing your diabetes.. God bless you

Thought I might have not been the easiest patient she has always been very keen and kind and has had always the time to discuss my issues with a lot of patience. 
My pregnancy journey has been very smooth so far I'm thankful to God for haven found her as this is my first pregnancy and I could have not asked for a better gyno.
I find her very quick and apt in her diagnosis.

Kudos to Dr. Meenakshi !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),Labor and Delivery,Anesthesia,
review: Had a wonderful experience with Dr.Meenakshi. She diagnosed hypertension and gestational diabetes around 26th week and treated me with well care and medication. She is very friendly and was very comfortable throughout my pregnancy visits.

review:

review: I would like to thank Dr Meenakshi for guiding and taking excellent care of my health during pregnancy. I had high risk pregnancy with few complications. I had to undergo cervical cerclage and the procedure was very well handled by the dr. Due to all the issues I had always thought that I will have c section delivery. But dr made sure and encouraged me for normal delivery. Everyone in my family was surprised to know that it was a normal delivery. I highly recommended Dr Meenakshi for her ********* ********* *** experience. She is very friendly and lets you know exactly what‚Äôs going to happen next. She is always available on phone and answers to all your questions on whatsapp. I really appreciate the care taken by Dr during my pregnancy.

review: We went to Dr. Meenakshi mam for treatment of my sister who was suffering from horrible pain during periods. after scans and all she explained about the condition and suggested for a surgery immediately..from that moment she was in touch with us personally and explained things and Laproscopy Surgery was done successfully. good care was taken in Shekhar hospital by the sisters..Till discharge and after that during follow up visit Meenakshi mam was so positive in her approach that even patients feel at ease and overcome their fears. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
